title: West Indies vs India, 1st ODI
description: Catch all the live updates from the first ODI between West Indies and India being played at Port of Spain

title: BCCI extends coach application deadline till July 9
description: The BCCI on Friday extended the deadline to apply for the post of Head Coach till July 9, ensuring that a broader pool is available to choose from after Anil Kumble's acrimonious exit.

title: Anil Kumble asked for 60% of skipper's fees
description: Remunerations dominated former India coach Anil Kumble's 19-page proposal on restructuring of contracts to the BCCI in which he had demanded that the "chief coach should earn 60 percent of the captains' estimated earnings".

title: Bumrah upset with his CT no-ball being used as an ad
description: After the tweet went viral, Jaipur traffic police issued an apology on twitter stating their intent was not to hurt his sentiments or the sentiments of millions of cricket fans. They only intended to create more awareness about traffic rules.

title: Bowler takes all 10 wickets in KSCA 3rd division
description: In a KSCA 3rd division league cricket match held in Bagalkot on Friday, medium pacer Varun Soragamvi took 10 wickets for his team Loyd foundation against Guledagudda cricket team.

title: Srikanth enters Australia Open S/F; Sindhu, Saina out
description: The World No. 22 Srikanth beat Praneeth in straight games 25-23, 21-17 in the all-Indian quarterfinal to reach his third consecutive Super Series semi-final.

title: Federer cruises past defending champ Mayer into Halle semis
description: Top seed Roger Federer reached the Halle Open semi-finals on Friday, beating defending champion Florian Mayer 6-3 6-4 and edging closer to a ninth title at the Wimbledon tune-up event.

title: Sania Mirza rues gender discrimination in sports
description: Decrying the widespread gender discrimination in society at large, Indian tennis star Sania Mirza rued the fact that the world of sports is also not immune from the malaise and she has to fight for equal prize money despite being a former World No. 1 in women's doubles.

title: FIH President Batra apologises for emotional outburst on social media
description: FIH President Narinder Dhruv Batra has apologised to several nations, including Pakistan, for his social media outburst during the recent Men's Hero Hockey World League Semi-Final match between India and Pakistan in London.

title: No need of a coach if Kohli thinks he is the boss: Prasanna
description: Former India off-spinner Erapalli Prasanna on Friday took a dig at Virat Kohli and said if the current skipper feels he is the "boss" of the Indian cricket then the team can do without a coach.

title: Australia the team to beat at ICC Women's World Cup
description: Led by Meg Lanning, the outstanding batsmen in the women's game today, Australia will be looking to win their seventh title in a tournament that now features the world's top eight one-day international sides.

title: Olympic Day: For these athletes, chasing dreams proved costly
description: Many athletes are forced to leave the field because of injuries. They are the ones who spent years for this and when they are injured, they get nothing back. While other countries take proper care of budding athletes and give them complete insurance.

title: Olympic Day 2017: Abhinav Bindra, India’s golden boy
description: On the occasion of International Olympic Day, relive Abhinav Bindra's historic gold medal at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

title: Australia players' association rejects new pay offer
description: Australia's cricketers rejected the board's offer of a revised pay deal on Friday as the bitter dispute over a revenue-sharing model rumbled on with just a week to go before the current agreement expires.

title: Prosecutors not against replacing Messi jail term with fine
description: Prosecutors in Barcelona say they are not against replacing football star Lionel Messi's 21-month jail sentence for tax fraud with a fine, a spokeswoman announced Friday.

title: Captain Virat Kohli reveals a lot without saying anything
description: Virat Kohli highlighted the respect that he and the rest of the Indian team has for Anil Kumble but offered little dope on what transpired between him and the legendary leggie that led to Indian cricket's second most infamous coach-captain rift.

title: Olympic Day 2017: India’s global domination in hockey
description: On the occasion of International Olympic Day, relive the Indian hockey team's golden era which saw them collecting a record eight gold medals at the Olympics.

title: HWL Semi-Final: Inconsistent India eye redemption against Pakistan
description: Bruised and battered after their shocking ouster from the title race, an inconsistent India would look for solace when they take on arch-rivals Pakistan in a 5th-8th classification match of the Hockey World League Semi-Final on Saturday.

title: Olympic Day 2017: Gagan Narang, India's first London 2012 medallist
description: On the occasion of International Olympic Day, a look back at Gagan Narang's bronze medal at the 2012 London Olympics.

title: Women cricketers lack recognition in India, says Mithali Raj
description: India women's cricket team skipper Mithali Raj has asserted that female cricketers should not be compared to their male counterparts.
